a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The number of conflicts divided by the number of all states. This accounts for the changing number of states over
time. Included are interstate, intrastate, and extrasystemic conflicts that were ongoing that year.
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program and Peace Research Institute Oslo (2024)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions. The sum across all regions can therefore be higher than the global number.
